name: Institute for Oncology and Radiology of Serbia Reviews

review.title: “Middle experienced”
review.pros: Pros – Hospital is very proffesional in relationship to the patients, very well equiped with nice personel. Research that is conducted in the institute is multidisciplinary with researchers in biology, chemistry, biochemistry, pharmacology and medicine.
review.cons: Cons – Research department is little bit disorganized and with low resorces for actual research. Greater freedom in decision making for younger researchers is needed. Low salaries compared to education of researchers.
